comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: The "Teeth" markings on the foreground B-25, "Hell's Fire" (serial 41-30278) are a carry-over from her previous assignment with 90th Bomb Squadron, 3rd BG. Re-assigned to the 345th BG, she flew with the 500th Bomb Squadron; she was lost in combat on 2 September 1944.
